titles.title: I've got the joy joy joy joy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've got the joy joy joy joy
down in my heart (where?)
Down in my heart (where?)
Down in my heart

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I've got the joy joy joy joy
Down in my heart (where?)
Down in my heart to stay

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And I'm so happy
So very happy
I've got the love of Jesus
in my heart (2x)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I've got the peace
that passes understanding
Down in my heart (where?)
Down in my heart (where?)
Down in my heart

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I've got the peace
that passes understanding
down in my heart (where?)
down in my heart to stay

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
I've got the wonderful love
of my blessed Redeemer
way down in the depths
of my heart (where?)
Down in the depths of my heart (where?)
Down in the depths of my heart

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
I've got the wonderful love of
My blessed Redeemer way down
in the depths of my heart (where?)
Down in the depths of my heart
To stay
